answers.answer: Hi there.From what you have described, the pain is most likely of neuropathic in origin.  Meaning, that the pain is generated primarily in the nerves themselves.  This type of pain and weakness can originate in conditions such as MS, ALS, micronutrient deficiency (like vitamin B), and most commonly, due to stress.  Fibromyalgia is also a common occurrence resulting in the same symptoms you are experiencing.  As there can be several possibilities, I suggest that you have yourself checked by your doctor, preferrable a neurologist so that you can be assessed and treated properly.I hope you can be rid of this pain soon.  Regards and God bless.
